paper_abstract: In this paper, we discuss t-norm extension operations of general binary operation for fuzzy true values on a linearly ordered set, with a unit interval and a real number set as special cases. On the basis of it, t-norm operations of type-2 fuzzy sets and properties of type-2 fuzzy numbers are discussed. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On type-2 fuzzy sets and their t-norm operations
